General.Name: BES Engineering Co
General.Description: BES Engineering Corporation engages in construction and engineering business. It operates through Construction, Construction Development, and Other segments. The company undertakes various civil engineering projects, such as roads, bridges, tunnels, ports, airports, MRT, high-tech plants, hospitals, exquisite residences, and other projects; invests in construction of buildings and development of industrial districts; develops industrial parks; and constructs high-end residences, and large-scale community development and construction. It leases engineering machinery and equipment; wholesales construction materials; retails food products and groceries; and provides apartment management, maintenance, and related services. In addition, the company offers security, movie broadcasting, theater entertainment, and parking lots services, as well as human resource, business management, engineering, and other consulting services. BES Engineering Corporation was founded in 1950 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
